commentary: The Black Queen's actions pretty much parallel what the White Queen did on Earth. She flies one of the Derse battleships through a defense portal and lands on postapocalyptic Alternia, with her cool shroudwear ready to go. She won't need it for long, though. Doc has quite a glamorous wardrobe upgrade ready for her. Doc and his master have a habit of granting certain women sick powers and conscripting them into long-term service, from which they can only be released by death.
